newsletter.emailwidget.EmailWidgetCode:
{% /* The Headline email widget allows to display a headline in the email. If no value is provided for the headline in the email widget properties, the code automatically returns a default text with an advise. This is sometimes a better option than using a default value in the property itself as that could remain unnoticed before sending (as default value meets the "required" criteria and is therefore not highlighted in the email builder). */ @%}
{% Text == String.Empty ? "Write a catchy headline for the section below." : Text |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)9d7bcbbe4c2f7f99c440d10c1493b6297f83ae95e30b89c8d3ef257e539c2fea%}
newsletter.emailwidget.EmailWidgetDescription: Displays a headline for the section below.

properties.fielddescription: Sets the text of the headline.
